channel.title: Need help fixing my command

item.title: Need help fixing my command
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

This?

if (c.playerRights == 4 && playerCommand.startsWith("chat")){
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
                                        if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
                                                Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
                                               
                                                       
                                                        if (!Connection.isMuted(c)) {
                                                        if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Owner")){
                                                                c2.sendMessage("<shad=800000000><img=1>[Main Owner]</col><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +":</col> "
                                                                                                + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                                                        }else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Co-Owner")){
                                                                c2.sendMessage("<shad=800000000><img=1>[Co-Owner]</col><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
                                                                                                + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                                                                               }else if (c.playerRights == 4){
                                                                c2.sendMessage("<col=800000000><shad=255>[Donator]<img=3>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
                                                                                + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                                                        }else if (c.playerRights == 0){
                                                                c.sendMessage("You need to be a donator or staff to yell.");

                                                                       
                                                        }
                                                }
                                        }
                                }
                        }

item.title: Need help fixing my command
item.dc:creator: @bob2568 bob2568
item.description:
@bob2568 wrote:

Definitely not switching clients, ive put to much work in, so i added a bracket and still the error in game, heres new code [code]if (c.playerRights == 4 && playerCommand.startsWith(“chat”)) {
}
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];

						if (!Connection.isMuted(c)) {
						if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Owner")){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=800000000><img=1>[Main Owner]</col><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +":</col> "
						                                        + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Co Owner")){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=800000000><img=1>[Co-Owner]</col><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
						                                        + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                                                   			}else if (c.playerRights == 4){
							c2.sendMessage("<col=800000000><shad=255>[Donator]<img=3>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
									+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 0){
							c.sendMessage("You need to be a donator or staff to yell.");

								
						}
					}
				}
			} [/code]

item.title: Need help fixing my command
item.dc:creator: @bob2568 bob2568
item.description:
@bob2568 wrote:

I accidently posted this to rsmodel help

Okay so whenever i use :: for commands it yells, im not sure why. im receiving no errors. here is my code

[code]if (c.playerRights == 4 && playerCommand.startsWith(“chat”));
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];

                                                    if (!Connection.isMuted(c)) {
                                                    if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Owner")){
                                                            c2.sendMessage("<shad=800000000><img=1>[Main Owner]</col><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +":</col> "
                                                                                            + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                                                    }else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Co-Owner")){
                                                            c2.sendMessage("<shad=800000000><img=1>[Co-Owner]</col><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
                                                                                            + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                                                                           }else if (c.playerRights == 4){
                                                            c2.sendMessage("<col=800000000><shad=255>[Donator]<img=3>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
                                                                            + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                                                    }else if (c.playerRights == 0){
                                                            c.sendMessage("You need to be a donator or staff to yell.");

                                                                   
                                                    }
                                            }
                                    }
                            }[/code]

Note - Im running a 317 pi
